thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express London - ExCeL - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Restaurant and Lounge.
thread.title_full: Great Restaurant and Lounge. - Review of Holiday Inn Express London - ExCeL, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jef O
title: Great Restaurant and Lounge.
text:
We're stayed here for 4 nights attending PeatEx the at London Excel centre.
See Paula in the lounge, she is absolutely lovely and has the best service around !
Holiday inn express - Excell is withig walking distance from the London excel centre and close to the underground rail.
Rooms are clean and tidy.
I would stay here again.
